channel.title: research students on Bárbara Bitarello
channel.description: Recent content in research students on Bárbara Bitarello

item.title: Kira Morozova
item.description: Hometown: Moscow, Russia Fun fact: I take pictures with a lot of traffic cones, because they’re orange like my hair:) Favorite book: The Gray House, by Maryam Petrosyan In the lab: joined us for the summer research program 2023 Broader project: Balancing selection: mechanisms, timescales, and signatures.

item.title: Kuankuan Hu
item.description: Pronouns: she/her/hers Hometown: Beijing, China Fun Fact: My favorite cartoon character is Snoopy In the lab: joined us in Spring 2024 Broader project: Balancing selection: mechanisms, timescales, and signatures.

item.title: Nicole Cavalieri
item.description: Pronouns: she/her/hers Hometown: Staten Island, New York Fun Fact: I have the same birthday as Mick Jagger In the lab: Worked on R teaching materials with the BMC Digital Scholarship Grant in summer 2023

item.title: Shriya Shivakumar
item.description: Fun Fact: I enjoy cooking, baking, eating extremely spicy food, reading and watching rom-coms. I also love Thai food and the chameleon, Pascal, from Tangled. In the lab: joined us 2022 in a dual mentorship program with Chris Thom at CHOP.
